Package com.testpaper.model

Class TestResult

java.lang.Object
com.testpaper.model.TestResult
@Entity public class TestResult extends Object
The TestResult class represents the result of a test taken by a user. It contains information such as the ID, test ID, user ID, number of correct answers, number of wrong answers, number of unanswered questions, and the set of selected options.
Since:
21-06-2023
Version:
17
Author:
TPG team
